execution_plan.description: Compute total revenue per customer in the EU region and return customer identifiers and contact info alongside summed revenue.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT c.id AS customer_id, c.email, c.full_name, c.country, SUM(o.total_eur) AS revenue_eur
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id
GROUP BY c.id, c.email, c.full_name, c.country;

execution_plan.description: Compute total revenue per customer in the US region and return customer identifiers and contact info alongside summed revenue.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT c.id AS customer_id, c.email, c.full_name, c.country, SUM(o.total_eur) AS revenue_eur
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id
GROUP BY c.id, c.email, c.full_name, c.country;
